channel.title: XTREME-PK. Full PVP World 1# | Mid Rates | Dragon Armour | Mall command | 24/7
channel.description:
The Xtreme PK server is back, loaded with lots of fun, :eek:
The main Reason i decided to bring it back its because i get bored after work and theres nothing good to do!,
I've tryed other servers and well it was fun but it didn't fill my expectations.. and i always wanted something new so thats why i've brought XTREME-PK Back :P
[img]http://img269.imageshack.us/img269/1479/serverad.png[/img]
[size=24pt][b]FEATURES :cool::[/b][/size]
FULL PVP World!! Attack anyone everywhere! (can be dissabled)
Dragon Armour!
Smithing Guild & fast CUSTOM Mining places
The Most powerful Weapon -> Titanium Sword
New Training Spots and a new Fishing Guild
Item Mall for rares and all weapons
Special Sound Effects & Website Music
Broadcast and Wilderness Broadcast!
PK STAGE
Training in Wilderness Gives twice EXP!!
Coloured Armours [img]http://img17.imageshack.us/img17/2650/colouredarmour.png[/img]
Sickest..!!
[b] WEBCLIENT AVALIABLE[/b]
--------------------------------------------------------------------- Totally i don't want to compete against any other server, this server was brought with the intention for fun only, i probably won't have donations because i'm a Salesman and that's good money, but in case that we change this i'll give those donations to the Haiti People and the server's internet service which is really fast ---------------------------------------------------------------------
Few Pictures
[img]http://img43.imageshack.us/img43/792/xad.png[/img]
[img]http://img195.imageshack.us/img195/3707/xpkmining.png[/img]
Hope to see you on guys and maybe just give us a visit.
[img]http://img508.imageshack.us/img508/8059/xpklogo.png[/img]
[size=18pt]Website at Signature[/size]

item.title: XTREME-PK. Full PVP World 1# | Mid Rates | Dragon Armour | Mall command | 24/7
item.dc:creator: @Officer-Ahole Officer-Ahole
item.description:
@Officer-Ahole wrote:

[quote=“bonzakid, post:45, topic:327194”][quote author=Kozy link=topic=423588.msg3121646#msg3121646 date=1265573661]

High rates quick leveling also quick staff to abuse powers Appearntly if you kill a staff or a friend of a staff they will jail you remove all your items and ect the server is down 5-8 hours a day Laggy registration barley works… Must donate to get anything good or spend countless hours trying I give it a 3/10 for its stability and 1/10 for mod and staff Coverage

Sums it up. O and lol @ his comment saying he spent countless hours working on the server. Slow ass internet, take that long to dl the source?
[/quote]
No mean to bump this post, but I just went onto it for my first time. Everybody please ROFL at me.

  1. When you create your account it redirects you to “Localhost” ROFL? L2 PHP?
  2. When you login, theres an “XTREME PK” tab, thats invisible, not even added as a sprite maybe? WTF is the go there? Useless.
  3. Report button is see-through, looks ugly.
  4. The colours look ugly.
  5. The “info” tab isn’t even fixed… It freezes your webclient because the nub who “attempted to code” fucked it up, and took the code out, L2 code.
  6. Massive fail, 1 player online when I logged in.
  7. Massive fail on PHP, can’t even create a website template and align/crop the background, GF?
  8. The radio is annoying, what’s the point.[/quote]

i’m a bit confused…

Retired from RSC Community.

Read full topic

No mean to bump this post, but I just went onto it for my first time. Everybody please ROFL at me.

  1. When you create your account it redirects you to “Localhost” ROFL? L2 PHP?
  2. When you login, theres an “XTREME PK” tab, thats invisible, not even added as a sprite maybe? WTF is the go there? Useless.

item.dc:creator: @nacional nacional
item.description:
@nacional wrote:

[quote=“dmaximus, post:23, topic:327194”] Hey Aaron,
assumimg the client is down again? Well i’ll keep checking back here or in game till it’s up…really enjoying the game play and the noob friendly edge npc’s. hella fast leveling, just need more people so economy and pking will pick up. THx for all yours and Daniels efforts in creating imo the best rsc pk server i’ve played in 9 yrs.

                                                                                                Thanks

                                                                                                Dmaximus
                                                                                                Xtreme4L1F3[/quote]

This guy played a rsc private server 9 years ago, impressive. Who would have thought
a private server in rs’s first year? I mean 2005.

Read full topic
